citeinfo.origin: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation
citeinfo.title: TRAILS_IDNR_IN: Public Recreational and Alternative Transportation Trails in Indiana (Indiana Department of Natural Resources, 1:24,000, Line Shapefile)

pubinfo.publish: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

descript.abstract:
NOTE: The original data set named INTRAILS.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on March 12, 2002, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. Also, portions of this metadata were originally authored by Michael P. Martin.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILINV_OPENUD_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on June 15, 2006, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OUTREC_IN_090216.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on February 16, 2009, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OR_100503.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on May 5, 2010, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OR_110413.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on April 13, 2011, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_120309.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on March 15, 2012, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_121002.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on October 10, 2012, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_130620.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on July 23, 2013, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_140612.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on June 12, 2014, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_150306.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on March 6, 2015, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_151207.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on December 7, 2015, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_160607.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on June 7, 2016, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_170419.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on April 20, 2017, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
NOTE: An updated data set named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_171221.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological and Water Survey personnel on February 12, 2018, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This data shows only trails that are open to the public, or trails that are under development, and planned trails. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set.
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_171221.SHP:
"This dataset contains polylines and attributes of public, off-road recreation and transportation trails in Indiana. It includes trails managed by federal, state, and local governments, as well as non-government organizations."
descript.purpose:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_171221.SHP:
"This data was developed for the purpose of aiding outdoor recreation planners and providers and transportation planners, and to disseminate trails information to the public. IT IS NOT INTENDED TO BE USED FOR ON-THE-GROUND NAVIGATION."

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Enterprise, ESRI ArcCatalog 10.5, Approximately 23.4 Mb

attracc.attraccr: In most cases, attribute information was provided by the managing entity of each trail. Any changes regarding the trail management since the data was acquired, including status, allowed uses, etc., might not be correctly reflected in this dataset.

dataqual.logic: This dataset is a shapefile. There is no topology.
dataqual.complete: This dataset only includes trails which are off-road, at least 1/2 mile in length, and open (or planned to be open) to the public. It only includes trails of which the IDNR is aware and has collected information.

horizpa.horizpar: (+/- 25 meters) Trail locations were added using a variety of sources: digitized from paper USGS 1:24000 quad maps or aerial photos on which the trails were hand drawn by their managing entities, GPS data collectors, or GIS data provided by the managing entity. Changes to trail locations made since data were acquired will not be correctly reflected in this database.

citeinfo.othercit: This source file was provided by Michael P. Martin, Agency GIS Coordinator, IDNR, to IGS personnel on February 12, 2018.

srcinfo.typesrc: Zip file containing an Esri shapefile
srcinfo.srccontr: Dataset includes trails which are off-road, at least 1/2 mile in length, and open (or planned to be open) to the public. It only includes trails of which the IDNR is aware and has collected information.

procstep.procdesc: Trail locations were hand-drawn by each trail's managing entity on 1:24000 USGS quad maps.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Trail locations were digitized from the paper USGS 1:24000 quad maps on which the trails were drawn.

New trails added to ESRI ArcInfo coverage by either collecting data using GIS Mapping-grade GPS data collector and post-processing when possible, or by digitizing from maps provided by managing entity. Route topology added based upon SegCode.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Route.Segment joined to Microsoft Access database which contains the attribute information, and exported for distribution.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Routes joined to Access then exported as shapefile.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Trails that are not open or not under development were removed from the data set.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources/Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received the shapefile titled INTRAILS from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on March 12, 2002. INTRAILS is a PolyLineM shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. INTRAILS was converted to a temporary ESRI ArcInfo coverage, TEST_TRAIL, paying careful attention to preserve the route topology (IGS personnel created the named feature class "route.segment" for future use.) TEST_TRAIL was then clipped using the IGS ESRI ArcInfo coverage for the state boundary, INCLP83 (which contains the area within the 92 county boundaries for the state of Indiana, which was compiled at a scale of 1:24,000) using ESRI ArcInfo (v 8.1). The resultant line coverage, T_TRAIL_CLP, was then converted to a shapefile named TRAILS_IDNR_IN, using ArcGIS ArcToolbox (v 8.1) (Wizard commands: Export from Coverage > Coverage to Shapefile > using the feature class "route.segment.")

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled TRAILINV_OPENUD_DNR_OR from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on June 15, 2006. TRAILINV_OPENUD_DNR_OR is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The attribute field titled "RouteCode" was deleted from TRAILINV_OPENUD_DNR_OR. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OUTREC_IN_090216" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on February 16, 2009. TRAILS_DNR_OUTREC_IN_090216 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OR_100503.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on May 5, 2010. TRAILS_DNR_OR_100503 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OR_110413.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on April 15, 2011. TRAILS_DNR_OR_110413 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_120309.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on March 15, 2012. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_120309 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_121010.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on October 10, 2012. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_121010 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_130620.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on July 23, 2013. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_130620 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_140612.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on June 12, 2014. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_140612 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_150306.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR) on March 6, 2015. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_150306 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_151207.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR) on December 7, 2015. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_151207 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_160607.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR) on June 7, 2016. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_160607 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_170419.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR) on April 20, 2017. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_170419 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. Personnel of the Indiana Geological and Water Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled "TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_171221.SHP" from Michael P. Martin (IDNR) on February 12, 2018. TRAILS_DNR_OutRec_IN_171221 is a polyline shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. The shapefile was then renamed TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP to follow IGS naming conventions. The metadata file was then extensively updated to reflect the latest enhancements of the updated information.

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

Name (of property) for each trail segment

distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT
It is requested that the Indiana Geological and Water Survey be cited in any products generated from this data. The following source citation should be included: [TRAILS_IDNR_IN.SHP: Public Recreational and Alternative Transportation Trails in Indiana (Indiana Department of Natural Resources, 1:24,000, Line Shapefile), 20171221].
WARRANTY
Indiana University, Indiana Geological and Water Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological and Water Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405 2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological and Water Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological and Water Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
